description: Demonstrators defied an internet shutdown using a channel called Nexta that posts videos and photos.
title: Belarus election: How Nexta channel bypassed news blackout
title_page: Belarus election: How Nexta channel bypassed news blackout - BBC News
maintext: "Who in 2020 needs a site that any official from the ministry of information can block with one click?" its founders ask. Its Telegram posts have been attracting hundreds of thousands of views, more than websites such as Tut.by, hit by censorship.
